Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameModelObserver

    public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameModelObserver
    This class represents an instance of the Game View. The game view is Displayed to the user as a GUI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameView(GameModel aModel, GameController aController)
      Purpose: Instantiates the game view and its components
